alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 14 at 1:36AM MDT until June 14 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Aurora, Davison, Hanson, McCook, Charles Mix, Douglas, Hutchinson, Bon Homme and Yankton Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...Until 5 AM CDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An area of weak showers is helping to draw down strong winds from aloft. These winds may briefly approach or exceed 60 mph.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Yankton
